name: 11ty-solid-base
description: A minimal HTML5 template and the esbuild setup to compile your Solidjs app alongside 11ty.

scripts.cloud: npm run clean && npm run build:sass && NODE_ENV=staging ELEVENTY_ENV=staging npm run build:eleventy -- --incremental
scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:sass && npm run prefix && NODE_ENV=staging ELEVENTY_ENV=staging npm run build:eleventy -- --incremental --pathprefix=11ty-solid-base
scripts.minify: npm run clean && npm run build:sass && npm run prefix -- --minify && NODE_ENV=production ELEVENTY_ENV=prod npm run build:eleventy -- --incremental --pathprefix=11ty-solid-base

author: woodcox
